features: 【SMART SIZE & ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT】 -- WANDF toiletry bag is only 3.6 oz and dimension is 9.5(L)x 4.7(W)x 5.9(H)inch, it is small when packed up and doesn't take up much space in the suitcase.
【EASY TO CARRY】 --- The side handle not only makes the travel bags for toiletries easy to carry but also can be used for hanging. Access toiletries easily and quickly!

【PREMIUM QUALITY】 --- Water-resistant, durable, Ultra-light nylon fabric, breathable mesh, SBS zippers. Come with clean stitching and strong zinc alloy zipper closure make the toiletries kits super wearable.

【ORGANIZED COMPARTMENTS】 --- Main compartment that holds larger items such as shampoo bottles or shaving cream. One zippered mesh pouch that keeps your smaller toiletries and cosmetics in a place visible and breathable. Other side front zipper pocket that provides extra storage with easy.

【CONVENIENT MULTI-USE BAG】 --- It was designed for both men and women and is an extremely versatile travel bag that can be used as a traditional toiletry bag, makeup or shaving kit case, a safe place to store your healthcare items while travelling, or it can be used as a carry-on airline bag.

reviews.reviewerName: Mays' Healthy Lifestyle Mays' Healthy Lifestyle
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value and good quality
reviews.reviewText: The Toiletry Bag for Men, the Hanging Dopp Kit, has proven to be an ideal solution for my gym trips. With a need for a separate kit, this bag fits the bill perfectly. Its lightweight design ensures it doesn't add unnecessary bulk to my gym bag, allowing for easy transport. The standout feature lies in its smart organization – the separate compartments are a game-changer compared to others with a single, cavernous space. I can now neatly store my toiletries, keeping everything accessible and in its place. The water-resistant quality is a bonus, adding a layer of protection to my items. Overall, this Dopp kit has streamlined my gym routine, enhancing convenience and functionality while maintaining a sleek and compact profile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A reliable and practical toiletry bag that provides quality, design, and convenience.
reviews.reviewText: If you're looking for a toiletry bag that is functional, durable, and lightweight, then look no further than the WANDF Hanging Dopp Kit. I recently purchased the royal blue version of this bag for an upcoming trip, and I couldn't be happier with my choice.Firstly, the size of the bag is just right. It's compact enough to fit in my carry-on luggage without taking up too much space but spacious enough to hold all of my toiletries. The dimensions are 9.5(L)x 4.7(W)x 5.9(H) inches, and it weighs only 3.6 oz, making it ultra-lightweight.What I love most about this bag is its easy carrying. The side handle makes it convenient to grab and go and can also be used for hanging in the bathroom. This feature is suitable in a hotel room with limited counter space.In terms of quality, the WANDF toiletry bag is top-notch. The water-resistant, durable nylon fabric and SBS zippers make it a long-lasting investment. The breathable mesh and clean stitching provide a well-ventilated and neat compartment for your toiletries.The bag is also thoughtfully designed with multiple compartments. The main room can hold more oversized items such as shampoo bottles or shaving cream. The zippered mesh pouch keeps your miniature toiletries and cosmetics organized and easily visible. Additionally, the front zipper pocket provides extra storage space.Lastly, this bag is versatile and can be used for various purposes. It's suitable for both men and women and can be used as a traditional toiletry bag, makeup or shaving kit case, a safe place to store your healthcare items while traveling, or even as a carry-on airline bag.In conclusion, I highly recommend the WANDF Hanging Dopp Kit to anyone needing a reliable and practical toiletry bag. Its quality, design, and convenience make it an excellent travel investment.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A Practical and Affordable Toiletry Bag for Travelers
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired a toiletry bag for my travels, and I am pleased to share my thoughts on this practical and affordable accessory. Designed to organize and store all your essential toiletries, this bag offers several standout features while maintaining a reasonable price point.First and foremost, the cost of this toiletry bag is quite impressive. Compared to similar options on the market, it offers excellent value for the quality and functionality it provides. If you're seeking a budget-friendly solution without compromising on durability and practicality, this bag is a fantastic choice.Speaking of quality, this bag is well-constructed and built to last. The materials used are sturdy and resistant to wear and tear. I appreciate the attention to detail in its design, including the robust zippers and reinforced stitching, which add to its overall longevity. Rest assured, this bag will endure frequent use and travel adventures without letting you down.The bag's compartments and size are another noteworthy feature. It offers ample space to accommodate all of your toiletries, including bottles, tubes, brushes, and more. The various compartments help you stay organized, allowing you to separate items and access them easily when needed. The thoughtful layout ensures that you can efficiently pack and locate your essentials, saving time and reducing hassle during your travels.However, it is important to note that the main compartment lacks internal dividers. While the bag has multiple compartments, the absence of dividers in the primary storage area means you may need to exercise caution when organizing your items. This limitation could potentially lead to minor shifting and jostling of contents during transit. It would be a great improvement if the bag included internal dividers to enhance organization and prevent items from mixing together.Despite this minor drawback, the overall functionality and value of this toiletry bag remain exceptional. Its affordability, quality construction, and ample compartments make it an excellent travel companion. Whether you're going on a short weekend getaway or an extended vacation, this bag offers the convenience and space you need to keep your toiletries neatly organized and readily accessible.In conclusion, if you're searching for an affordable toiletry bag that doesn't compromise on quality and functionality, this option is definitely worth considering. While it lacks internal dividers in the main compartment, its overall design, cost-effectiveness, and well-thought-out compartments make it a reliable choice for travelers. Keep your toiletries neatly organized and ready for your next adventure with this practical and affordable toiletry bag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great looking product for the price
reviews.reviewText: Overall, very nice productgreat look.3 sections with pockets etcTime will tell but could see this getting dirty quickly.Could be tiny bit for sturdy. Its ok. Hold shape.An improvement would have been the middle main section zippers to not go all the way to bottom (as then items can fall out).Overall Id still recommend this product as good for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight & Roomy (Not just "for men")
reviews.reviewText: I'm not sure why the description days this is "for men". This is a gender-neutral toiletry bag with many compartments, loads of room, is lightweight, easy to keep organized, perfect size for people who want the option of bringing more stuff. This is not a stiff, structured toiletry bag. It's more like a light nylon, which is perfect if that's what you're looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great quality, great fabric. These for some reason Have become hard to come by in the stores without paying close to $20. This was the perfect size for my husbands suitcase. Fits all of his toiletries (some travel, some standard size) plus his electric razor with room to spare. Also able to toss into the washer to clean after setting in a hotel for a week!

reviews.reviewTitle: Compact but holds more than you expect.
reviews.reviewText: I used it for a day trip to the lake. It held my bathing suit, sun protection and other useful accessories . It is divided into three compartments with zippered closures. It is well-made, good looking and very reasonably priced.
I like that it’s a type of material that is easily washable and dried by hand. Average size for item of its type. Happy with my purchase.
Quality wise it’s made to last long enough to get your moneys worth but is lower quality than the one it replaced.It works and I’m happy with it.
Really like this bag, holds everything.
I would have given 5 stars but the zipper split on the first use.
